fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Document about a player each night, their visitors and the player they visit will be kept on a list you can't see normally.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Once you get 4 or more names, your list is instantly cleared and you learn all the names, you can learn the same name multiple times.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all evil threats to the Underdogs.
